mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from adoptBoard where postDisable = 0
mapper.update: update adoptBoard set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where adoptId = #{value}

update adoptBoard set petName = #{petName}, petGender = #{petGender}, petDetail = #{petDetail}, neuter = #{neuter}, vaccin = #{vaccin}, tel = #{tel}, content = #{content}, petImg = #{petImg} where adoptId = #{adoptId}
update adoptBoard set postDisable = 1 where adoptId = #{adoptId}
